question: 栄光
sourceMnemonic: You helped your city <kanji>prosper</kanji>, and a <kanji>light</kanji> shines out of you, so that the entire city can bask in your <vocabulary>glory</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
